params.data: The init data of the BigBang contract
params.mc: The address of the master contract which must be already registered
params.useCreate2: Whether to use create2 or not

params.contractType_: The risk type of the contract

params.data: The init data of the Singularity
params.mc: The address of the master contract which must be already registered
params.useCreate2: Whether to use create2 or not

params.contractType_: The risk type of the contract

setBigBangEthMarket(address).details: needed for the variable debt computation

params.enable: True to enable the swapper. To disable use False.
params.swapper: The address of the swapper contract that conforms to `ISwapper`.

params.direct: True if `newOwner` should be set immediately. False if `newOwner` needs to use `claimOwnership`.
params.renounce: Allows the `newOwner` to be `address(0)` if `direct` and `renounce` is True. Has no effect otherwise.

withdrawAllBigBangFees(address[],address.details: `swappers_` can have one element that'll be used for all clones. Or one swapper per MasterContract.Fees are withdrawn in TAP and sent to the FeeDistributor contract

params.swappers_: One or more swappers to convert the asset to TAP.

withdrawAllSingularityFees(address[],add.details: `swappers_` can have one element that'll be used for all clones. Or one swapper per MasterContract.Fees are withdrawn in TAP and sent to the FeeDistributor contract

params.swappers_: One or more swappers to convert the asset to TAP.

bigBangMarkets().notice: Get all the BigBang contract addresses

claimOwnership().notice: Needs to be called by `pendingOwner` to claim ownership.

executeMarketFn(address[],bytes[],bool).notice: Execute an only owner function inside of a Singularity or a BigBang market

paused().notice: returns the pause state of the contract

setBigBangEthMarketDebtRate(uint256).notice: sets the main BigBang market debt rate

setSwapper(address,bool).notice: Used to register and enable or disable swapper contracts used in closed liquidations. MasterContract Only Admin function.

singularityMarkets().notice: Get all the Singularity contract addresses

tapAssetId().notice: returns TAP asset id registered in the YieldBox contract

transferOwnership(address,bool,bool).notice: Transfers ownership to `newOwner`. Either directly or claimable by the new pending owner. Can only be invoked by the current `owner`.

updatePause(bool).notice: updates the pause state of the contract

usdoAssetId().notice: returns USD0 asset id registered in the YieldBox contract

wethAssetId().notice: returns WETH asset id registered in the YieldBox contract

withdrawAllBigBangFees(address[],address.notice: Loop through the master contracts and call `depositFeesToYieldBox()` to each one of their clones.

withdrawAllSingularityFees(address[],add.notice: Loop through the master contracts and call `depositFeesToYieldBox()` to each one of their clones.

userdoc.notice: + asset registration? (toggle to renounce ownership so users can call)Singularity management
